ack.title: Authors’ contributions
ack.p: CK designed the carbon balance model of this study, conducted the simulation, and wrote the manuscript. YT designed the model together with CK, and helped write the manuscript. MT built the research team that conducted the research project, participated in the design of this study, and helped write the manuscript. All authors have read and approved the final manuscript.
